00182     {

00201     public static function create($cats)
00202     {
00203         $orderedCats = array();
00204         foreach ($cats as $cat) {
00205             $orderedCats[] = new Galleria_Element_Category($cat->id, $cat->name, $cat->parent, (isset($cat->haspics) ? $cat->haspics : true));
00206         }
00207         return self::_appendChildren(0, $orderedCats);
00208     }

00220     private static function _appendChildren($parent, $children)
00221     {
00222         $selected = array();
00223         $notselected = array();
00224         foreach ($children as $child) {
00225             if ($child->getParent() == $parent)
00226                 $selected[] = $child;
00227             else
00228                 $notselected[] = $child;
00229         }
00230         foreach ($selected as $schild) {
00231             $schild->addChildren(self::_appendChildren($schild->getId(), $notselected));
00232         }
00233         return $selected;
00234     }
00235 
00245     public static function howMany($element)
00246     {
00247         if (is_array($element)) {
00248             $count = 0;
00249             foreach ($element as $cat) {
00250                 $count = $count + $cat->getCount();
00251             }
00252         } else
00253             $count = $element->getCount();
00254         return $count;
00255     }
00256 
00266     public static function jsonFormat($element)
00267     {
00268         if (is_array($element)) {
00269             $result = array();
00270             foreach ($element as $cat) {
00271                 $result[] = self::jsonFormat($cat);
00272             }
00273         } else {
00274             $specs = array(
00275                 'id' => $element->getId(),
00276                 'info' => array($element->getName())
00277             );
00278             if ($element->hasChildren())
00279                 $specs['children'] = self::jsonFormat($element->getChildren());
00280             $result = (object) $specs;
00281         }
00282         return $result;
00283     }
